member.name: T:System.Web.WebPages.Deployment.PreApplicationStartCode
member.summary: Provides a registration point for pre-application start code for Web Pages deployment.

member.name: M:System.Web.WebPages.Deployment.PreApplicationStartCode.Start
member.summary: Registers pre-application start code for Web Pages deployment.

member.name: T:System.Web.WebPages.Deployment.WebPagesDeployment
member.summary: This type/member supports the .NET Framework infrastructure and is not intended to be used directly from your code.Provides methods that are used to get deployment information about the Web application.

member.name: M:System.Web.WebPages.Deployment.WebPagesDeployment.GetAssemblyPath(System.Version)
member.summary: This type/member supports the .NET Framework infrastructure and is not intended to be used directly from your code.Gets the assembly path for the Web Pages deployment.
member.returns: The assembly path for the Web Pages deployment.

member.name: M:System.Web.WebPages.Deployment.WebPagesDeployment.GetExplicitWebPagesVersion(System.String)
member.summary: This type/member supports the .NET Framework infrastructure and is not intended to be used directly from your code.Gets the Web Pages version from the given binary path.
member.param: The binary path for the Web Pages.

member.name: M:System.Web.WebPages.Deployment.WebPagesDeployment.GetIncompatibleDependencies(System.String)
member.summary: This type/member supports the .NET Framework infrastructure and is not intended to be used directly from your code.Gets the assembly references from the given path regardless of the Web Pages version.
member.returns: The dictionary containing the assembly references of the Web Pages and its version.
member.param: The path to the Web Pages application.

member.name: M:System.Web.WebPages.Deployment.WebPagesDeployment.GetMaxVersion
member.summary: This type/member supports the .NET Framework infrastructure and is not intended to be used directly from your code.Gets the maximum version of the Web Pages loaded assemblies.
member.returns: The maximum version of the Web Pages loaded assemblies.

member.name: M:System.Web.WebPages.Deployment.WebPagesDeployment.GetVersion(System.String)
member.summary: Gets the Web Pages version from the given path.
member.param: The path of the root directory for the application.

member.name: M:System.Web.WebPages.Deployment.WebPagesDeployment.GetVersionWithoutEnabledCheck(System.String)
member.summary: This type/member supports the .NET Framework infrastructure and is not intended to be used directly from your code.Gets the Web Pages version using the configuration settings with the specified path.
member.param: The path to the application settings.

member.name: M:System.Web.WebPages.Deployment.WebPagesDeployment.GetWebPagesAssemblies
member.summary: This type/member supports the .NET Framework infrastructure and is not intended to be used directly from your code.Returns the assemblies for this Web Pages deployment.
member.returns: A list containing the assemblies for this Web Pages deployment.

member.name: M:System.Web.WebPages.Deployment.WebPagesDeployment.IsEnabled(System.String)
member.summary: This type/member supports the .NET Framework infrastructure and is not intended to be used directly from your code.Indicates whether the Web Pages deployment is enabled.
member.returns: true if the Web Pages deployment is enabled; otherwise, false.
member.param: The path to the Web Pages deployment.

member.name: M:System.Web.WebPages.Deployment.WebPagesDeployment.IsExplicitlyDisabled(System.String)
member.summary: This type/member supports the .NET Framework infrastructure and is not intended to be used directly from your code.Indicates whether the Web Pages deployment is explicitly disabled.
member.returns: true if the Web Pages deployment is explicitly disabled; otherwise, false.
member.param: The path to the Web Pages deployment.
